all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And by the weak things of the earth the Lord shall thresh the nations by the power of his Spirit.
Doctrine and Covenants 133:59
Quote of the Day
"The Savior is the Prince of Peace. We are to be His instruments for peace."
President Russell M. Nelson | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
